author: Joey Grostern and Sam Bright
description:
James Orr, an ally of Nigel Farage and JD Vance, accused the UK of adopting a “naive and dangerous” approach to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine at an event organised by an oil-funded think tank. Speaking at a festival hosted by Mathias Corvinus Collegium (MCC) in Esztergom, Hungary last week, Orr accused politicians of failing to “reflect […]

The post Farage and Vance ‘Sherpa’ Attacked ‘Ukraine Brain’ at Oil-Backed Festival appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Farage and Vance ‘Sherpa’ Attacked ‘Ukraine Brain’ at Oil-Backed Festival

author: Raluca Besliu and Aleksandra Pogorzelska
description:
EU grant money was used to fund a media workshop on plastic pollution that was run in partnership with a fossil fuel lobby group, DeSmog can reveal. The event, held in May, came at a crucial time – just months before the start of the latest UN Global Plastics Treaty negotiations. The latest round, running […]

The post How Big Oil Hijacked EU-Funded Journalism Training on Plastic Pollution appeared first on DeSmog.
title: How Big Oil Hijacked EU-Funded Journalism Training on Plastic Pollution
